div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: P치gina Principal Contactos Programas Directorio

<script type='text/javascript'>
            <!-- eleva la visualizacion de las imgenes -->
            console.log("ver");
            let elevacionfinalizada = false;
        
            if (!elevacionfinalizada) {
              const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
                const lastElement = document.body.lastElementChild;
                console.log("ultimo elemento");
                if (lastElement.classList.value == "CSS_LIGHTBOX") {
                      lastElement.style.zIndex = "10";
                      console.log("elevado");
                      console.log(elevacionfinalizada);
                      elevacionfinalizada = true;
                }
              });
                  observer.observe(document.body, {
                  childList: true,
                  subtree: false
              });
            }
            </script>
